name: Wrapped Bitcoin (PulseChain)
description: WBTC on PulseChain is the forked version of WBTC on Ethereum, provided as an exclusive airdrop to Ethereum WBTC holders at PulseChainâ€™s launch. WBTC on PulseChain, commonly called "pWBTC" by the PulseChain community, has the same smart contract address and code as WBTC on Ethereum, or "eWBTC", but with a fixed supply of 154,410 tokens determined by the blockchain snapshot on May 10, 2023. WBTC on PulseChain presents a unique opportunity in decentralized finance.
